backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature update targeting the Contact page email address.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summaries of all frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all routes and renders the RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, quick links, disclaimer, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, logo, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and Outlet for routed pages.
frontend/src/content/education.ts: Typed content definitions for all educational sections with structured text and bullets.
frontend/src/content/resources.ts: Defines a Resource interface, crisis-related text constants, and an array of crisis, support, treatment, and information resources.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context and provider, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with warm color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders an About page with mission, approach, audience sections, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Displays email and Instagram contact info plus a link to the resources page.
frontend/src/pages/Faq.tsx: Provides an FAQ list about addiction, treatment, and recovery using an accordion UI.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards, and links to key educational and resource pages.
frontend/src/pages/HowToSupportSomeone.t: Loads education content for supporting someone and displays it using alert and card sections.
frontend/src/pages/RecoveryBasics.tsx: Renders recovery basics education content in a series of cards with headings and optional bullet lists.
frontend/src/pages/RelapseNextSteps.tsx: Displays relapse guidance with an informational alert and structured education content sections.
frontend/src/pages/Resources.tsx: Organizes crisis, support, treatment, and information resources into categorized card sections with links.
frontend/src/pages/SignsRiskFactors.tsx: Shows signs and risk factors education content dynamically using cards and bullet lists.
frontend/src/pages/WhatAddictionIs.tsx: Presents foundational information about addiction using structured education content cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata including feature requests, domain plans, and site summary.
